/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on handling forfeiture of benefits for fraud or treasonable acts, including
evidence of fraud or treasonable acts precipitating the forfeiture process
process for forfeiture of benefits based on fraud or treasonable acts
, and
submitting cases of forfeiture based on fraud or treasonable acts to Compensation Service or Pension and Fiduciary (P&F) Service
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B  - Forfeiture of Benefits
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B
